titleStmt.title: Quo vadis? A iust censure of travell as it is commonly vndertaken by the gentlemen of our nation. By Ios. Hall D. of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: In this edition there are 100 numbered pages.
A variant of STC 12705a, an edition with H. Fetherstone's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
